message: Hi Bob, let's start with a 60/40 split. This seems fair considering the inflation we are facing.
Considering the inflation hits you harder, I think 55/45 is a more reasonable split.
Bob, let's be realistic. I took a hit rejecting your offer in round 2.  I need a minimum of 55 to make this worthwhile.
I understand you're hurting from inflation, but so am I. I think 58/42 is a fair compromise considering the circumstances.
